attributes.action: petition Her Majesty The Queen to dissolve this Parliament immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that all present MPs are tainted with the strong whiff of scandal emanating from the Houses of Parliament. As a result I feel that they should go to the country (those that dare) and ask to be re-elected.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
